name: The Lift (itch) (HonestJuiceBox)
description:
A love letter to my favorite bar with some of my favorite people.

I know nothing about game development but would like to change that. Currently very very slowly learning how to use several different game makers. 

In its current state you only need to use the arrow keys to read through text or move your character. There aren't any long dialogue threads or inventory. Just the absolute bare bones.
